scripts.build: cd .. && npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const qaVer=fs.readFileSync('qa-testing/versions/.qa-version','utf8').trim(); const pkgVer=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8')).version; const src='mnee-'+pkgVer+'.tgz'; const dst='qa-testing/versions/qa-mnee-'+qaVer+'.tgz'; fs.copyFileSync(src,dst); console.log('Created: '+dst);"
scripts.bump: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const v=fs.readFileSync('versions/.qa-version','utf8').trim().split('.'); v[2]++; const newVer=v.join('.'); fs.writeFileSync('versions/.qa-version',newVer); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8')); pkg.dependencies.mnee='file:versions/qa-mnee-'+newVer+'.tgz'; fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n'); console.log('QA version bumped to: '+newVer+' and package.json updated');"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:balance && npm run test:balances && npm run test:batch && npm run test:config
